<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 18"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Cape of the Open Sky](/Equipment.aspx?ID=948)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 74

**Price** 22,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This cloth of gold cape was originally gifted to one of Goka's emperors centuries ago. Since then, it has spawned many imitations, which are all alike in that they are dyed with an elaborate seal depicting two drakes flanking Goka's palace and the Seven Dragons Bridge. The beautiful cape grants you a +3 item bonus to checks to [Lie](/Actions.aspx?ID=47) and to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50). While you wear the cape, the weather (including wind and fog) doesn't affect your movement or vision. Additionally, whenever you fall while wearing the _cape of the open sky_, the cape automatically casts [_feather fall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=111) on you.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact;     **Effect** The cape becomes a pair of golden drake wings that grant you a fly Speed of 30 feet for 1 hour.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> command;  **Frequency** once per minute;   **Effect** The cloak pushes you onward. You Stride or [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=94) up to your Speed, but you can move only in a straight line. You gain a +15-foot status bonus to your Speed and fly Speed for this movement.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
